refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A LineAnnotation is an author or editor's comment on a line in one of the verbatim environments. These are annotations added by the documentor, not part of the original listing.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: In verbatim environments like ProgramListing, which are often presented in a fixed width font, they may get special typographic treatment, such as italics.
If several lineannotations occur in the same listing, they may be aligned horizontally.
